metrics.name: Number of systems in analysis
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(DISTINCT "kpiIns_ID")

metrics.name: Completion Score
metrics.signalFragment: AVG(CASE WHEN "COMPLETION_CNT" = 'TRUE' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoices parked
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices parked") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoices previously parked
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices previously parked") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoices created by dialog user
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices created by dialog user") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoices manually created using a custom transaction
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices manually created using a custom transaction") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoices manually created using transaction FBxx
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices manually created using transaction FBxx") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoices manually created using transaction MIRO
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices manually created using transaction MIRO") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoices created after posting date
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices created after posting date") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoices reversed
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Supplier invoices reversed") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoices created for internal trading partners
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Supplier invoices created for internal trading partners") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP items currently blocked for payment
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AP items currently blocked for payment") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP items previously blocked for payment
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AP items previously blocked for payment") * 100

metrics.name: Payment block released using a custom transaction
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Payment block released using a custom transaction") * 100

metrics.name: Open FI-AP items with net due date in the past
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - Open FI-AP items with net due date in the past") * 100

metrics.name: Open FI-AP items with possible discount
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - Open FI-AP items with possible discount") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP items not cleared via payment run
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AP items not cleared via payment run") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP items cleared more than 3 days before net due date and with no discount
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AP items cleared more than 3 days before net due date and with no discount") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP items cleared with account maintenance transaction FB1K
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AP items cleared with account maintenance transaction FB1K") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP clearing items entered after clearing date
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AP clearing items entered after clearing date") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP items cleared after net due date
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AP items cleared after net due date") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP items cleared despite payment block
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AP items cleared despite payment block") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP items cleared with discount lost
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AP items cleared with discount lost") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP items cleared with discount applied
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("3 - Info - FI-AP items cleared with discount applied") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP items cleared with discount applied but late payment
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("2 - Blocker - FI-AP items cleared with discount applied but late payment") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoices created and posted (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - Supplier invoices created and posted") * 100

metrics.name: Supplier invoices created and posted (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - Supplier invoices created and posted")

metrics.name: FI-AP items released for payment (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - FI-AP items released for payment") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP items released for payment (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - FI-AP items released for payment")

metrics.name: FI-AP clearing documents created (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - FI-AP clearing documents created") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP clearing documents created (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - FI-AP clearing documents created")

metrics.name: FI-AP items cleared (completion rate)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("STEP - FI-AP items cleared") * 100

metrics.name: FI-AP items cleared (total lead time)
metrics.signalFragment: AVG ("4 - Lead time from start - FI-AP items cleared")

metrics.name: Issue supplier invoice
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Issue supplier invoice')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.name: Create invoice via post document transaction FB01
metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create invoice via post document transaction FB01')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100

metrics.signalFragment: COUNT(case_id) FILTER (WHERE event_name MATCHES ('Create invoice via post invoice transaction FB60')) / COUNT(case_id) * 100
